Script.EP1: 率直に言いまして
Meaning.EP1: Let me be frank.

Script.EP1: 現状の由希奈さんの成績では 不可能です
Meaning.EP1: It would be impossible with Yukina's current marks.

Script.EP1: 不可能とは
Meaning.EP1: What do you mean?

Script.EP1: 全ての可能性を試して 初めて言える言葉です
Meaning.EP1: You can only use the word "impossible" after trying every possibility.

Script.EP1: 全てを試しましたか？
Meaning.EP1: So, have you tried everything?

Script.EP1: 最低でも 偏差値を 30上げなければなりません
Meaning.EP1: At the very least, she will have to raise her standard score by 30.

Script.EP1: 大ざっぱに言えば
Meaning.EP1: To put it simply,

Script.EP1: あと18ヶ月で50万人を 追い抜くということです
Meaning.EP1: she'll need to overtake half a million people in 18 months.

Script.EP1: 可能だと思いますか？
Meaning.EP1: Do you think that's possible?

Script.EP1: 本人が行きたいと 言ってるんです
Meaning.EP1: She says she wants to go. Are you just going to stomp on her dreams?

Script.EP1: その芽をつむつもりですか？
Meaning.EP1: Are you just going to stomp on her dreams?

Script.EP1: 芽すら出ていません
Meaning.EP1: It's barely a pipe dream.

Script.EP1: 土の中で たわ言を言っているだけです
Meaning.EP1: It's merely wishful thinking at this point.

Script.EP1: 頑張ればできる やってみろと言うのが
Meaning.EP1: She can do it if she tries. Isn't it your job to tell her to try?

Script.EP1: 先生の務めなのでは？
Meaning.EP1: Isn't it your job to tell her to try?

Script.EP1: 教え子に現実を知らしめ
Meaning.EP1: It's my responsibility as a teacher

Script.EP1: 可能な範囲で行ける場所を アドバイスする それが教師の務めです
Meaning.EP1: to have my students face reality, and advise them on attainable goals.

Script.EP1: 逆境こそ 子供を成長させるものでしょうに
Meaning.EP1: Adversity helps children grow.

Script.EP1: 逆境ではありません 無謀です
Meaning.EP1: This is not adversity. It's reckless.

Script.EP1: 本人の才能と努力の両方が 足りない結果が 今の成績です ハァ…
Meaning.EP1: Her current marks are a direct result of her lack of talent and effort.

Script.EP1: お母さん 娘さんをあなたと 同じだと思わないでください
Meaning.EP1: Madam, please, don't assume your daughter is the same as you were.

Script.EP1: 人それぞれなんです
Meaning.EP1: Every person is different.

Script.EP1: 先生の今後の働きに期待します ハァ…
Meaning.EP1: I look forward to your future progress.

Script.EP1: お母さん…
Meaning.EP1: Mother.

Script.EP1: すみません 先生
Meaning.EP1: I'm sorry, sensei.

Script.EP1: 白羽…
Meaning.EP1: Shirahane...

Script.EP1: そもそも “火星”は進路じゃないぞ
Meaning.EP1: Mars isn't exactly a career choice.

Script.EP1: そうですね 目的地ですよね
Meaning.EP1: You're right. It's a destination, isn't it?

Script.EP1: そこじゃないだろ
Meaning.EP1: That's not my point.

Script.EP1: それに火星移住計画自体 今じゃ実現の可能性は…
Meaning.EP1: Besides, the Mars migration project isn't likely to happen at this point.

Script.EP1: ん？ それは君のかい？
Meaning.EP1: Besides, the Mars migration project isn't likely to happen at this point. Wait, is that yours?

Script.EP1: あ？ オッス！
Meaning.EP1: Yo.

Script.EP1: 美夏 お母さん どっち行った？
Meaning.EP1: Mika, which way did my mom go?

Script.EP1: え？ 上？ どったの？
Meaning.EP1: Up? -What's wrong? -Mom forgot her phone.

Script.EP1: お母さん スマホ忘れてった
Meaning.EP1: What's wrong? -Mom forgot her phone.

Script.EP1: うお カッケ～！ 国連仕様？ 超クール！
Meaning.EP1: Whoa, awesome. Is it for the U.N.? That's so cool.

Script.EP1: お母さん！ これ！ お母さん！
Meaning.EP1: Mother, you forgot this! Mom!

Script.EP1: 由希奈 火星人なんていないから！
Meaning.EP1: Yukina, there aren't any Martians, okay?

Script.EP1: もう ハァ… カッコいいわ～
Meaning.EP1: She's so cool.

Script.EP1: 由希奈のお母さんって クールだよね
Meaning.EP1: Your mom is so cool.

Script.EP1: 母親っぽいことなんて これっぽっちもないよ
Meaning.EP1: There's nothing motherly about her.

Script.EP1: うちのオカンなんて ただのオバチャンだよ？
Meaning.EP1: My mom's just a plain old lady.

Script.EP1: それに比べりゃさ 研究所の所長さんだもんね
Meaning.EP1: Compared to that, your mom's the head of the laboratory.

Script.EP1: そんで どうだった？ 進路相談
Meaning.EP1: So, how did career counseling go?

Script.EP1: 何て書いたの？
Meaning.EP1: What'd you write?

Script.EP1: 火星 は？ 暑いほうだっけ？
Meaning.EP1: Mars. Is that the hot one?

Script.EP1: 寒いほう
Meaning.EP1: The cold one.

Script.EP1: でも まいっちゃった お母さん 反対しないんだもん
Meaning.EP1: But I can't believe it. My mom didn't object at all.

Script.EP1: 人生もっと真面目に考えろよ
Meaning.EP1: Take your future more seriously.

Script.EP1: でも 何で火星なん？
Meaning.EP1: But why Mars?

Script.EP1: 火星の運河とか 見てみたいな～って思って
Meaning.EP1: Because I thought it'd be cool to see the canals on Mars.

Script.EP1: え？ あれって本当にあるの？
Meaning.EP1: Do they really exist?

Script.EP1: ないの？
Meaning.EP1: They don't?

Script.EP1: ないってなったはずだよ？
Meaning.EP1: I thought they said they didn't.

Script.EP1: ウッソだ～！ 絶対 隠してるんだよ
Meaning.EP1: No way. They're definitely hiding something.

Script.EP1: あんた そういうの好きだよね
Meaning.EP1: You really love crap like that.

Script.EP1: 火星の河岸段丘とか 見てみたいかも
Meaning.EP1: Seeing river terraces on Mars would be cool, too.

Script.EP1: 意味分かんね てかそれ お母さんのでしょ？
Meaning.EP1: I don't know what that means. And isn't that your mom's?

Script.EP1: あっ 忘れてた！
Meaning.EP1: Oh, I forgot.

Script.EP1: そんな大事なもん忘れてくなんて さすが由希奈のお母さん
Meaning.EP1: It's so like your mom to forget something that important.

Script.EP1: でも 持ってくしかないよね
Meaning.EP1: But now you've gotta take it to her.

Script.EP1: え～ やだ～ 行きたくない
Meaning.EP1: What? No way. I don't wanna go.

Script.EP1: つべこべ抜かすな あとに続け！ レッツゴー！
Meaning.EP1: Quit your whining. Follow me. Let's go.

Script.EP1: 行くぞ～ 早く～！
Meaning.EP1: Come on, hurry up.

Script.EP1: あっ やっほ～ ソフィー
Meaning.EP1: Oh, hey there, Sophie.

Script.EP1: ソフィーも三者面談？
Meaning.EP1: Did you have a guidance meeting, too?

Script.EP1: こんにちは
Meaning.EP1: Hello.

Script.EP1: いいえ 私には必要ありませんから
Meaning.EP1: No, because I do not need one.

Script.EP1: そっか ソフィー まだ若いもんね
Meaning.EP1: Oh, that's right. You're still young.

Script.EP1: 私は もう決めていますから 今 やってることを極めるだけです
Meaning.EP1: I have already chosen my career. I simply need to hone what I am doing now. What about you, Yukina?

Script.EP1: 由希奈さんは？
Meaning.EP1: I simply need to hone what I am doing now. What about you, Yukina?

Script.EP1: 私は… 火星だってさ
Meaning.EP1: I... -She said Mars.

Script.EP1: かせい？ マーズ？
Meaning.EP1: Mars? The red planet?

Script.EP1: そう 火星人のいるとこ
Meaning.EP1: That's right, where the Martians are.

Script.EP1: バカは休み休みお言いになるほうが よろしいですよ
Meaning.EP1: Perhaps you should be limiting your jokes to less essential matters.

Script.EP1: すんません
Meaning.EP1: I'm sorry.

Script.EP1: ソフィーは これから仕事？
Meaning.EP1: Are you off to work, Sophie?

Script.EP1: ええ それでは ごきげんよう
Meaning.EP1: Yes. So, farewell.

Script.EP1: ばいにゃあ～
Meaning.EP1: Bye. -Bye.

Script.EP1: あの子 すごいよね 飛び級だもんね
Meaning.EP1: She is so amazing. I mean, she even skipped a grade.

Script.EP1: しかも国連の研究所で 仕事してるっていうね
Meaning.EP1: And she works at the U.N. laboratory.

Script.EP1: もう私らとはデキが違いますよ
Meaning.EP1: She's nothing like us.

Script.EP1: あっ そうだ これ 持ってってもらおう
Meaning.EP1: Oh, I know. I'll have her take this with her.

Script.EP1: ソフィー！ これ 持ってって～！
Meaning.EP1: Sophie, take this with you!

Script.EP1: お嬢様 お友達が追いかけてきますが
Meaning.EP1: Miss. Your friend is running after us.

Script.EP1: そのまま行ってちょうだい はい
Meaning.EP1: Please, don't slow down. -Yes, miss.

Script.EP1: 乗ります！ 乗ります！ 乗ります！
Meaning.EP1: We're getting on!

Script.EP1: 増水して 川筋 変わっとる
Meaning.EP1: Look how the water level's changed its flow.

Script.EP1: いつも見てるけどさ 飽きないの？
Meaning.EP1: Don't you ever get tired of looking at it?

Script.EP1: 飽きないよ
Meaning.EP1: No way.

Script.EP1: さよか
Meaning.EP1: That right?

Script.EP1: えい！ ああ ちょっと！
Meaning.EP1: Hey, hold on!

Script.EP1: ダムだ～！
Meaning.EP1: It's the dam!

Script.EP1: 相変わらず すげ～！
Meaning.EP1: Why's it always so awesome?

Script.EP1: はいはい
Meaning.EP1: Yeah, yeah.

Script.EP1: 帰りに いくらでも見ていいから
Meaning.EP1: You can look at it as much as you want on our way home.

Script.EP1: ん？ お～ でっけえ
Meaning.EP1: Whoa, they're huge.

Script.EP1: あれって由希奈のお母さんが つくったんだっけ？
Meaning.EP1: I forgot, did your mom make those?

Script.EP1: そうみたい
Meaning.EP1: Seems like she did.

Script.EP1: 何で ここ来るのイヤなん？
Meaning.EP1: Why do you hate coming here?

Script.EP1: あんまり好きじゃない
Meaning.EP1: I don't like it that much.

Script.EP1: ああいうの
Meaning.EP1: Being treated like that.

Script.EP1: ああ あんた 所長の娘だもんね
Meaning.EP1: You're the chief's daughter, after all.

Script.EP1: 無駄に緊張するんだよね 周りの目がねえ
Meaning.EP1: It makes me so nervous. Everybody looking at me.

Script.EP1: ねえ 美夏は進路 何て書いたの？
Meaning.EP1: Hey, Mika. What did you write for your career?

Script.EP1: 就職かなあ
Meaning.EP1: Probably getting a job.

Script.EP1: どこに？
Meaning.EP1: Get a job where?

Script.EP1: さあ 才能も根性も脳ミソもない
Meaning.EP1: Who knows? Anywhere that'd hire an idiot without talent, work ethic, or brains.

Script.EP1: おバカを雇ってくれる所なら どこでもいいかな
Meaning.EP1: Anywhere that'd hire an idiot without talent, work ethic, or brains.

Script.EP1: 今の成績だと厳しいよねえ
Meaning.EP1: It'd be pretty tough with your marks.

Script.EP1: 親戚のみんなは “美夏は大器晩成だね”って 言ってくれるんだよ？
Meaning.EP1: My family always says that great talent matures later.

Script.EP1: だから 雇ってくれれば 絶対 活躍するんだけどなあ （由希奈）うんうん
Meaning.EP1: So, if I get hired, I know I'd do a good job.

Script.EP1: 美夏を見てると 私も頑張ろうって思えるんだ
Meaning.EP1: Watching you really makes me want to try harder.

Script.EP1: なんか バカにされてるような 気がした
Meaning.EP1: I feel like you're making fun of me.

Script.EP1: 気のせい
Meaning.EP1: Not at all.

Script.EP1: じゃ 私 お父さん 驚かせてくる
Meaning.EP1: Well, I'm going to go surprise my dad.

Script.EP1: 食堂だっけ？
Meaning.EP1: He works in the cafeteria, right? -Yeah, he's a chef.

Script.EP1: そうそう 調理師 この時間は暇だろうし
Meaning.EP1: He works in the cafeteria, right? -Yeah, he's a chef. I'm sure he won't be busy right now.

Script.EP1: ４時でいい？
Meaning.EP1: Meet back at four?

Script.EP1: あいよ～ また あとでね
Meaning.EP1: Sounds good. See you later.

Script.EP1: にゃあ～
Meaning.EP1: Bye.

Script.EP1: まったく
Meaning.EP1: Honestly.

Script.EP1: どうして 学校で渡してくれなかったの？
Meaning.EP1: Why didn't you just hand it to me at school?

Script.EP1: いつもそう 周りの話なんか全然 聞いてない
Meaning.EP1: You're always like this. You don't listen to anybody else.

Script.EP1: はい
Meaning.EP1: Here.

Script.EP1: ありがと
Meaning.EP1: Thanks.

Script.EP1: とにかく火星に行くつもりなら もっと頑張らないとダメね
Meaning.EP1: Anyway, you'll need to work harder if you want to go to Mars.

Script.EP1: 頑張って どうにかなると思えない
Meaning.EP1: I don't think working hard will be enough.

Script.EP1: 大丈夫 あなたは私の娘なんだから
Meaning.EP1: Don't worry, you're my daughter, after all.

Script.EP1: やめてよ
Meaning.EP1: Stop that.

Script.EP1: あっ そうそう 行くんなら 小春(こはる)が大きくなってからにしてね
Meaning.EP1: Oh, but you'll have to wait until Koharu grows up before you leave for Mars.

Script.EP1: お母さんも 少しは子育てしてよ
Meaning.EP1: Would it kill you to raise her yourself?

Script.EP1: あら 由希奈は育てたけど？
Meaning.EP1: Well, I raised you, didn't I?

Script.EP1: 私を育てたのは おじさんだよ！
Meaning.EP1: Uncle's the one who raised me.

Script.EP1: 親の心 子知らずよね
Meaning.EP1: Children never understand what their parents go through.

Script.EP1: 少しは頑張って あの担任 見返してやりなさい
Meaning.EP1: How about you try a little harder and make your teacher eat his words?

Script.EP1: 気が向いた時だけ 親ヅラしてさ
Meaning.EP1: You only act like a mother when it's convenient.

Script.EP1: どうしよっかな…
Meaning.EP1: What am I going to do?

Script.EP1: 弾道ミサイルじゃないんだな？
Meaning.EP1: It's not a ballistic missile?

Script.EP1: ミサイルの大きさではありません
Meaning.EP1: It's not the size of a missile.

Script.EP1: 隕石かと思われます
Meaning.EP1: We believe it's a meteorite.

Script.EP1: 軌道傾斜角98度
Meaning.EP1: Trajectory's angle of inclination is 98 degrees.

Script.EP1: 対地速度 秒速２キロ
Meaning.EP1: Groundspeed is two kilometers per second.

Script.EP1: ２キロ？ 隕石にしちゃ遅いな
Meaning.EP1: Two kilometers? That seems slow for a meteorite.

Script.EP1: オブジェクト１ エントリー
Meaning.EP1: Object 1 has entered the atmosphere.

Script.EP1: 落着地点 出ました
Meaning.EP1: We've calculated its point of impact.

Script.EP1: あっ オブジェクト１が… 多数の破片を落としています
Meaning.EP1: Several fragments are breaking off of Object 1.

Script.EP1: 分裂したのか？ 確認できません
Meaning.EP1: -Did it break apart? -Unable to confirm.

Script.EP1: オブジェクト１ 減速しています！
Meaning.EP1: Object 1 is slowing down.

Script.EP1: 何だって!?
Meaning.EP1: What?

Script.EP1: 悪い鬼が またやってくるんだ
Meaning.EP1: The bad ogres are going to come again.

Script.EP1: また？
Meaning.EP1: Again?

Script.EP1: そう
Meaning.EP1: That's right.

Script.EP1: 遠い遠い世界から
Meaning.EP1: From a world far, far away.

Script.EP1: 人を食いに戻ってくるんだよ
Meaning.EP1: They're returning to eat the humans.

Script.EP1: 食べられる
Meaning.EP1: They're gonna eat us.

Script.EP1: ヤベっ！ 何だ まだこんな時間かあ
Meaning.EP1: Crap. Oh, it's still 3:30.

Script.EP1: 荒俣さん
Meaning.EP1: Mr. Aramata.

Script.EP1: あ？ ああ ゆきちゃん
Meaning.EP1: Oh, Yuki.

Script.EP1: こんにちは 洋海君のところかい？
Meaning.EP1: Hello! Here to see Hiromi?

Script.EP1: ええ まあ
Meaning.EP1: Well, yes.

Script.EP1: たまには家に帰るように 言ってるんだかな ハァ…
Meaning.EP1: I keep telling her to go home once in a while.

Script.EP1: 誰なんです？ 洋海の娘 由希奈だよ 誰なんです？ 洋海の娘 由希奈だよ 小春ちゃんは 相変わらず
Meaning.EP1: Who is that?

Script.EP1: 誰なんです？ （ポーラ）洋海の娘 由希奈だよ （ジロー）誰なんです？ （ポーラ）洋海の娘 由希奈だよ 時代劇ばっかり 見てるの？ （ジロー）誰なんです？ （ポーラ）洋海の娘 由希奈だよ （ジロー）誰なんです？ （ポーラ）洋海の娘 由希奈だよ （由希奈） そうなんですよ
Meaning.EP1: That's Hiromi's daughter Yukina.

Script.EP1: そうなんですよ なるほど あの子が なるほど あの子が なるほど あの子が いい趣味してるよね
Meaning.EP1: I see, so, that's her.

Script.EP1: あれって… どこかで見たことある！
Meaning.EP1: I think I've... seen that thing before.

Script.EP1: ザ･キューブだよ
Meaning.EP1: It's the Cube.

Script.EP1: 知ってます！
Meaning.EP1: I know it.

Script.EP1: 60年前 トンネル工事中に 破砕帯から出てきたんですよね
Meaning.EP1: It was found during the construction of a tunnel 60 years ago.

Script.EP1: 詳しいね
Meaning.EP1: Very good.

Script.EP1: でも 部外者が 見てもいいんですか？
Meaning.EP1: But are you sure it's okay for me to see it?

Script.EP1: 問題ないよ
Meaning.EP1: No problem at all.

Script.EP1: 公にされた “アーティファクト”だしね
Meaning.EP1: It's an Artifact that's already been made public.

Script.EP1: 何も分かってないですが
Meaning.EP1: Not that we've found anything out about it.

Script.EP1: こいつに比べたら 下の巨人は まだマシかな
Meaning.EP1: I guess the giant below is better compared to this.

Script.EP1: 巨人？
Meaning.EP1: Giant?

Script.EP1: あまり公にはされていない もう１つの“アーティファクト”だよ
Meaning.EP1: It's another Artifact that hasn't really been made public.

Script.EP1: ここに研究所がつくられた 理由でもある
Meaning.EP1: It's also the reason this laboratory was built here.

Script.EP1: 理由… って何です？
Meaning.EP1: What reason is that?

Script.EP1: 動かせないから
Meaning.EP1: It's because we can't move it.

Script.EP1: でも あれは 巨人というより“鬼”ですね
Meaning.EP1: But I'd say it's more of an ogre than a giant.

Script.EP1: 鬼… ですか？
Meaning.EP1: Ogre?

Script.EP1: 白羽岳人教授… 君のお父さんは
Meaning.EP1: Professor Takehito Shirahane. Your father was studying the local folklore around here, wasn't he?

Script.EP1: この辺りの伝承を 調べていたんですよね？
Meaning.EP1: Your father was studying the local folklore around here, wasn't he?

Script.EP1: はい…
Meaning.EP1: Yes.

Script.EP1: お父さんは 何も言ってませんでした？
Meaning.EP1: Did your father not mention anything?

Script.EP1: 鬼のことを ああ…
Meaning.EP1: About the ogres?

Script.EP1: 父は ８年前に失踪したきりで
Meaning.EP1: My father hasn't been back since disappearing eight years ago.

Script.EP1: ああ… そうでしたか
Meaning.EP1: Oh, I see.

Script.EP1: バ～カ
Meaning.EP1: Dumbass.

Script.EP1: え？ なになに？
Meaning.EP1: What's going on?

Script.EP1: これは…
Meaning.EP1: Is this...?

Script.EP1: 下がって うわっ！
Meaning.EP1: Get back!

Script.EP1: 今のは… あっ！
Meaning.EP1: What was that?

Script.EP1: 落着を確認！
Meaning.EP1: Ground impact confirmed!

Script.EP1: 富山湾沖合３キロメートル
Meaning.EP1: Three kilometers offshore Toyama Bay.

Script.EP1: 付近で演習中の 海自の潜水艦“みちしお”が
Meaning.EP1: Michishio, a nearby Maritime SDF submarine,

Script.EP1: 調査に向かっています
Meaning.EP1: is heading to inspect it.

Script.EP1: 散らばった破片は？
Meaning.EP1: What about the fragments?

Script.EP1: 長野から富山の一帯に 落ちたもよう
Meaning.EP1: Crashed somewhere between Toyama and Nagano.

Script.EP1: 国連の施設にも落ちたようです
Meaning.EP1: It's also crashed into a U.N. facility.

Script.EP1: 荒俣さん 大丈夫？
Meaning.EP1: Mr. Aramata, are you okay?

Script.EP1: こりゃ たまげた
Meaning.EP1: Oh, my God.

Script.EP1: メガネ メガネ… 隕石？
Meaning.EP1: Was it a meteorite?

Script.EP1: マジ隕石？
Meaning.EP1: An actual meteorite?

Script.EP1: 急げ！
Meaning.EP1: Hurry up!

Script.EP1: ここは 国際連合の所轄する研究施設である
Meaning.EP1: This is the United Nations Research Laboratory.

Script.EP1: 許可なき立ち入りは 攻撃の対象となる
Meaning.EP1: You will be fired upon for trespassing.

Script.EP1: ただちに退去せよ！
Meaning.EP1: Vacate immediately.

Script.EP1: 何 あれ？
Meaning.EP1: What are those?

Script.EP1: 外は危ない 地下に逃げるんだ！
Meaning.EP1: It's dangerous. We need to run to the basement.

Script.EP1: 荒俣さんは？
Meaning.EP1: What about you?

Script.EP1: わしは洋海君のところに！
Meaning.EP1: I'm going to find your mother.

Script.EP1: 私はラボに戻る あんたたち 早く地下に避難して！
Meaning.EP1: I'm going back to the lab. You two need to evacuate to the basement.

Script.EP1: 消火を最優先でな とにかく施設の中には入れるな
Meaning.EP1: Prioritize extinguishing the fire. Just keep them out of the facility.

Script.EP1: デカいのは相手にしなくていい
Meaning.EP1: You don't have to engage the large one.

Script.EP1: 今後の指揮権は 私に委譲してもらいます よろしいですね
Meaning.EP1: I will take command from here. Do I have your permission?

Script.EP1: もちろんです グラハム少佐 お任せします
Meaning.EP1: Of course, Major Graham. I leave this to you.

Script.EP1: これより当研究所は 非常事態態勢に入る
Meaning.EP1: This facility will be following emergency protocol.

Script.EP1: 全ての指示は守備隊司令部から 発令する
Meaning.EP1: All orders will be sent from the Garrison HQ.

Script.EP1: アルファ小隊 西入り口からの敵の侵入を阻止
Meaning.EP1: Alpha Squad, prevent enemy infiltration from the west gate.

Script.EP1: 現状維持 現状維持 ブラボー小隊から 補給要請
Meaning.EP1: What's your current status?

Script.EP1: ブラボー小隊から 補給要請 ブラボー小隊から 補給要請 認めたくないんですけど 認めたくないんですけど
Meaning.EP1: I don't want to admit it.

Script.EP1: チャーリー小隊と交代 あの人が 言っていたとおりってことですか？ あの人が 言っていたとおりってことですか？ あの人が 言っていたとおりってことですか？ デルタ小隊を裏庭の 掃除に行かせろ
Meaning.EP1: But does that mean he was right?

Script.EP1: デルタ小隊を裏庭の 掃除に行かせろ （荒俣）そうだねえ
Meaning.EP1: It looks like it.

Script.EP1: でも 僕が引退してからに してほしかったな…
Meaning.EP1: But I wish they would've waited until after I retired.

Script.EP1: 少佐 ガウス１のボーデン大尉から
Meaning.EP1: Major, incoming from GAUS 1's Captain Borden.

Script.EP1: 少佐！
Meaning.EP1: Major.

Script.EP1: ここにあるのは そびえ立つクソですか？
Meaning.EP1: What's all this crap we have?

Script.EP1: クソを飾っても 臭えだけですよ！
Meaning.EP1: Why keep it around if we're not gonna use it?

Script.EP1: ハァ… 出せる状態ですか？
Meaning.EP1: Can it be deployed?

Script.EP1: 万全ではありませんが 動作は保証します
Meaning.EP1: It's not in peak condition, but I guarantee it'll move.

Script.EP1: 現状での稼働限界は１時間
Meaning.EP1: It has a one-hour operation limit.

Script.EP1: ですが 実戦における消耗は未知数
Meaning.EP1: But the consumption rate during real combat is unknown.

Script.EP1: マスドライバー テストは終わってますな？
Meaning.EP1: Have you finished testing the mass driver?

Script.EP1: 実機射出は まだですが…
Meaning.EP1: We haven't actually fired it yet.

Script.EP1: 使います？
Meaning.EP1: Do you want to use it?

Script.EP1: ゲートは開けたくないので
Meaning.EP1: I don't want to open the gate.

Script.EP1: ガウス１ ２ 出撃準備
Meaning.EP1: GAUS 1, GAUS 2, prepare to deploy.

Script.EP1: マスドライバーの出力最小で 射出
Meaning.EP1: Launch the mass driver at minimum output.

Script.EP1: このクズめが！
Meaning.EP1: Those idiots.

Script.EP1: 早く おっ立てろ！
Meaning.EP1: Hurry up and get us up there.

Script.EP1: 外に出る前に 戦争が終わっちまうぞ
Meaning.EP1: The fight's gonna be over before we get there.

Script.EP1: 重力スタビライザー 出力全開
Meaning.EP1: Gravity stabilizer, max output.

Script.EP1: イナーシャキャンセラー キャリブレート よし
Meaning.EP1: Inertia canceller calibration, check.

Script.EP1: 重力子収束 よし
Meaning.EP1: Graviton convergence, check.

Script.EP1: そびえ立つクソを ひり出すぞ！
Meaning.EP1: Time to take the trash out.

Script.EP1: ここは… どこだ？ ハッ！
Meaning.EP1: Where am I?

Script.EP1: 壊れてはおらぬのか？
Meaning.EP1: Is it not broken?

Script.EP1: 姫！ え？
Meaning.EP1: Princess.

Script.EP1: ご無事でしたか はい？
Meaning.EP1: You are safe. -What now?

Script.EP1: 拙者の思い違いでござった
Meaning.EP1: I was... I was mistaken...

Script.EP1: だ… 誰だ 君は！
Meaning.EP1: Who are you?

Script.EP1: 青馬(おうま)剣之介時貞(ときさだ)！
Meaning.EP1: Kennosuke Tokisada Oma.

Script.EP1: うぬら 鬼の手先か！
Meaning.EP1: Did the ogres send you?!

Script.EP1: じっくり かわいがってやる
Meaning.EP1: I'll show you a good time, baby.

Script.EP1: 泣いたり笑ったり できなくしてやる！
Meaning.EP1: You ain't gonna be able to walk straight.

Script.EP1: ビッチみてえに ケツが軽いじゃねえか
Meaning.EP1: You're one fast bitch.

Script.EP1: この首なし野郎が！
Meaning.EP1: You headless bastard!

Script.EP1: 殺す気か このクソ小娘が！
Meaning.EP1: You trying to kill us, you dumb wench?!

Script.EP1: 失礼
Meaning.EP1: My apologies.

Script.EP1: クソ！
Meaning.EP1: Damn it.

Script.EP1: ドタマかち割って クソ流し込んでやる！
Meaning.EP1: I'll split your head open and take a dump in it.

Script.EP1: うん ナイスショットです
Meaning.EP1: Nice shot.

Script.EP1: ケツに120ミリ食らって くたばりやがれ
Meaning.EP1: Hope you like that 120 mm up your ass.

Script.EP1: だ… 姫…
Meaning.EP1: Princess...

Script.EP1: ご無事で
Meaning.EP1: Are you unharmed?

Script.EP1: あっ あそこです！
Meaning.EP1: Over there.

Script.EP1: 鬼の走狗どもめ
Meaning.EP1: Vile hands of the ogre.

Script.EP1: ゆ… 由希奈君を どうする気だ？
Meaning.EP1: What are you going to do to Yukina?

Script.EP1: ん？ ゆきな？
Meaning.EP1: Yukina?

Script.EP1: この人 誰ですか？
Meaning.EP1: Who is this man?

Script.EP1: 知らない人
Meaning.EP1: A stranger.

Script.EP1: 重力減衰型直立外殻の 略なんだって
Meaning.EP1: So, apparently GAUS is an acronym for Gravity Attenuation Upright Shell.

Script.EP1: 黒部の研究所で つくられたんだよ
Meaning.EP1: It was built at Kurobe Laboratory.
